'''Charlotte''' is a firefighter who was burned in the Mt. Baker fire.

==History==
While fighting a wildfire on Mt. Baker, Charlotte sustained a burn to one butt cheek. She was brought to the ER, where her burn was treated by [[Arizona Robbins]]. She was told her burn would heal in about six weeks and given crutches to use until it didn't hurt to walk anymore.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
====[[Alice]]====
She is dating Alice. Alice came to the hospital to take her home even though she said she was fine.

====[[Arizona Robbins]]====
While Arizona was treating her, she flirted with Charlotte. As she was being discharged, Arizona invited her to get a cup of coffee, but the invitation was interrupted by Charlotte's girlfriend coming to get her.

==Career==
Charlotte is a firefighter with [[Seattle Fire Department]]. While fighting a fire on Mt. Baker, she was burned on her butt. She feels guilty for being happy when there's fires because that's how she makes her living.

==Notes and Trivia==
*She says no guy has seen her butt since a middle school wardrobe malfunction.
